<var 20 E802 /var> MGP is required to purchase a ticket. You currently possess <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var>. Proceed?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I'm afraid you lack the points to play. Why not bolster your funds with a visit to the attendant behind me? <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Thank you for your patronage, but you can only purchase three Mini Cactpot tickets a day. Perhaps another of our amusements would help pass the time till the next drawing?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Come one, come all─drawing number <var 20 E804 /var> of the Mini Cactpot is here! Care to try your luck with a ticket, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Look! A poor, defenseless chocobo hatchling has wandered her way up the cliffs of Mt. Corel and is now trapped at the top. I would save her myself, I would, but I am no alpinist and, as a Lalafell, have a severe aversion to heights.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

That, and there appears to be a gang of unruly goblins tossing grenados at any would-be rescuer. Is there naught you can do, wealthy patro...er...kind adventurer!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Quite the fall, I must say! Your form was impeccable! And they say only coeurls land on their feet! However, despite your victorious bout with gravity, there still is the problem of the stranded hatchling...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Attempt the climb once more?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You've saved her! I think the little hatchling has learned a very valuable lesson here today. I do believe we can set the chick on her way knowing that she will never again put herself in danger.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Now, the Jolly Raptor doesn't pay me enough to fend off brutish brigands, so I seek someone with the savvy to steal by these snakes and spirit the ceramics to the attendants awaiting their arrival. Just make certain you stay out of their sight!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Now, the Jolly Raptor doesn't pay me enough to fend off brutish brigands, so I seek someone with the savvy to steal by these snakes and spirit the ceramics to the attendants awaiting their arrival. Just make certain you stay out of their sight!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
M-M-My Baby B-B-Bootkins! Won't s-s-someone s-s-save my B-B-Baby Bootkins fwom those t-t-tewwible hobgobwins!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Ma said to s-s-stay away fwom the big statue, b-b-but B-B-Bootkins is at the top, and if I...and if I...and if I don't s-s-save her, who will!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Awe you alwight <var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var> adventuwer? Now I know why Ma towd me to stay away fwom that statue... B-B-But now who'll s-s-save B-B-Bootkins!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Try again to save the hatchling?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Thank you! Thank you! You saved my Baby Bootkins! From now on, we'll only play around Mt. Corel!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Oh, you do not seem to have enough space, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I will be happy to hand over your prize after you make some room for it in your luggage.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
This Jumbo Cactpot ticket looks to be in order. Now, let us see what you have won...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I could sense by the way you thrust your pelvis as you strut across the hall that the gods created you for one purpose, and one purpose alone─to dance!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Will you not join my troupe of performers on stage and show the world your talent? You need only mimic the motions of the Lords and Ladies of the Dance, and I shall make you a star!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Proceed to the main stage?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The Lords and Ladies of the Dance will perform four emotes in succession. Memorize the order and execute the proper emotes when given the cue. The emotes used in the routine will be automatically added to your hotbar.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Simply put, the prizes for the Jumbo Cactpot are larger when more people participate. You're sure to rake in the MGP if you join in the fun with all your friends!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
The participant bonus in the Jumbo Cactpot increases all MGP prizes based on the number of tickets sold.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
There are multiple levels to the participant bonus. The higher this level becomes, the larger the subsequent bonus.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You have won <var 08 E3E80205 ((<var 09 E802 ((1st)) ((2nd)) ((3rd)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E802 /var>th)) /var> prize)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>─along with the extra points for the Early Bird Bonus.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

My gods─you have hit the Cactpot! Allow me the honor of presenting you with first prize, your extravagant <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020202 /var>, <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> the bonus MGP for being an early bird!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I am terribly sorry, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but you can no longer claim prizes for that ticket. Allow me to take it off your hands, and offer my condolences for your missed fortune.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I don't know if you've heard, but there's an imp flittering about, stealing people's skins and making them look the fool. And now he's taken mine! Can you help me catch the fiend?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You'll know him by his impeccable disguise, right down to the fine details. Take a good look at what I'm wearing, then find the man wearing the same and douse him with this brightash!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Thank heavens, you did it! Now I can rest easy...though that imp is still free to cause mischief, isn't he?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You failed!? Nooo! Now everyone will think <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> was the one dancing on a table in my smallclothes, propositioning every Sea Wolf as they passed by...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Bah! How in the hells did ya know it was me!? Well, I guess ya got me─have a little somethin' and be on your way.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I won't try foolin' people again, I promise! If I'm lyin', then may the gods twist me into a gangly bug-eyed flyin' beastie.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Ugh! But what's worse than being stared at is being doused with gods-know-what!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Ugh, my eyes! Gods, that stings...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Thal's balls, that burns! Why in the hells are ye trying to stop me fun!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
What is the—<cough><cough> meaning of this!? How many times must I endure this insufferable treatment?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Oh, the pain! And the physicker told me not to get any brightash in my eyes for at least another week!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
That is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> the punishment I had in mind, thank you very much!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
What...!? What did you do that for!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<cough> Wh-What in the hells are you doin'!? Right bleedin' unpleasant, that was!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Aaahhh! My eyes! <cough> <wheeze>Just what do you think you're doing!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
My clothes! They're ruined! Gold Saucer management will be hearing of this!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Wh-What mummery is this!? Are you a trouper? I want no part of it!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
H-Hey now! If I've outstayed my welcome, you might've simply asked me to leave!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Help! Help! I'm blind!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
What the— <cough> Is this how they...<cough>...welcome guests to the Gold Saucer?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I carry with me a special delivery for one Godbert Manderville. It appears the man has a deep interest in Thorne Dynasty crockery, and is buying up all that he can find. This endeavor, however, has drawn the attention of some unsavory characters.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Now, the Jolly Raptor doesn't pay me enough to fend off brutish brigands, so I seek someone with the savvy to steal by these scoundrels and spirit the ceramics to the attendant awaiting their arrival. Just make certain you stay out of their sight!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

That was quite the display of stealth! I reckon even a snake could learn a thing or three from a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of your cunning.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Whatever you do, <var 1A 02 /var>don't<var 1A 01 /var> let the thieving thieves see you with that vase! And if they do? Why, drop the package and run. It matters not if it shatters, as long as it doesn't fall into the highwaymen's hands. The last thing my client wants is to repurchase something that is already his.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The conniving crooks! And to think you were so close! Fortunately, Lord Manderville was quite aware of the dangers of shipping such sought-after cargo, and the Jolly Raptor is exempt from any financial responsibility in the event of theft or damage. Now, I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> happen to have several more packages here if you seek a chance at redemption?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Re-don the delivery cap?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Ah, Lord Manderville will be quite pleased with this fine addition to his collection. Your assistance is appreciated.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Another vase? I only think Lord Manderville purchases these things because he <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var>. I don't even think he minds when one is dropped because that simply means no one else can have it either. Anyroad, you've done the Saucer a great service. I'll prepare your reward so you can be on your way.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Ah, Lord Manderville has been expecting this delivery for some time now. He will be very pleased to find it has arrived unscathed. You have my thanks.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Don the delivery cap?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
It'll be well worth your while, since there is an extra bonus for those who claim their winnings quickly!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

We'll also announce all the other fantastic bonuses at the drawing. You won't want to miss all the action that goes on right here at the Cactpot Board!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

In addition to your other winnings, you will receive the Early Bird Bonus if you claim your prize within <var 08 E804 ((<var 08 E2E8040B ((<var 09 E804 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var> <var 08 E4E80402 ((hour)) ((hours)) /var> (Earth time) of the Jumbo Cactpot drawing.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
When Master Typhon's nose blows, whither the mucus flows...nobody knows! Can you read his motions and seek safe haven from the oncoming tempest?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

If you think you have what it takes to be the last one standing, then step right up! And if you <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> get caught in a squall of sputum─hey, there's nothing to lose but your dignity.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
If you have the courage to stand against Master Typhon once more, the stage awaits you. Remember: you're not defeated until you admit defeat. <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Proceed to the main stage?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Come to see Master Typhon in all of his gelatinous glory? You're welcome to look on, but I daresay you won't be havin' half the fun of those up on stage. Next time you have the chance, why not give it a go?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Don't get yourself down, friend─I've seen Master Typhon do that to the best of them. Now stand tall, and wear that mucus as a badge of honor!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
What in the world are you doing down here!? The show is about to begin!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Brilliant! I've marked upon your map the location of three Gold Saucer attendants to whom you may entrust the package. Any one of the three will do. Good luck and godsspeed!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

<var 60 0203 /var>We have a winner! Please accept my congratulations─and your prize of <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP! And remember: there's always more to be won on the morrow!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Your patronage is most appreciated, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I hope to see you again tomorrow!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Welcome to drawing number <var 20 E802 /var> of the Jumbo Cactpot! Can I interest you in a ticket to fame and fortune?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I'm afraid you're early for the drawing, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Can I help you with anything while you wait?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Why, we've already drawn the winning number for your ticket, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Why not claim your prize from the cashier over there?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

It pains me to say that you can't claim prizes with that ticket anymore, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. <sigh> What a pity. Ah well, better luck next time, and remember─you can't wait forever to claim your prize.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The Jumbo Cactpot is Eorzea's premier lottery, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You play by purchasing a ticket, starting from the low, low price of <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP, and then picking your numbers─four digits between zero and nine.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Why, it seems no one has hit the Cactpot yet. Who knows─maybe you could be the first in the realm to win first prize!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Where is your Jumbo Cactpot ticket, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? If you have yet to purchase one, please see the broker─she can help you with everything.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I do beg your pardon, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but this week's winning number has yet to be announced.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Per Gold Saucer regulations, only chocobos which have received the necessary training are permitted to participate in sanctioned chocobo races. <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Our races are categorized into different classes, which indicate the level of competition you can expect.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Ah, how silly of me. You could not possibly compete without a registered race chocobo. Pray return once you have delivered the necessary forms to our trainer.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

When we draw the winning number, it's time to check it against the ones on your ticket. In order from the last digit to the first, the more matching numbers you have, the greater the prize you'll receive.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I should also mention that Lady Luck herself announces the winning number. Why not come by to see the show?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

And don't forget to speak with the lovely Cactpot cashier to collect your winnings. If you've won the vaunted first prize, she'll also present you with a wonderfully extravagant gift!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You can purchase up to three Jumbo Cactpot tickets per week. My gods─you have hit the Cactpot! Allow me the honor of presenting you with first prize, and your extravagant <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020202 /var>!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Well, now all you've to do is wait till we announce the winning number. Why not join us here at the Cactpot Board for the drawing?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Use brightash on the atypical adventurer?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I carry with me a special delivery for one Godbert Manderville. It appears the man has a deep interest in Thorne Dynasty crockery, and is buying up all that he can find. This endeavor, however, has drawn the attention of some unsavory characters.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Don the delivery cap?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Brilliant! I've marked upon your map the location of three Gold Saucer attendants to whom you may entrust the packages. Any two of the three will do. Good luck and godsspeed!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I carry with me a special delivery for one Godbert Manderville. It appears the man has a deep interest in Thorne Dynasty crockery, and is buying up all that he can find. This endeavor, however, has drawn the attention of some unsavory characters.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Don the delivery cap?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Brilliant! I've marked upon your map the location of three Gold Saucer attendants to whom you must entrust the packages. Make certain each attendant is presented with a parcel. Now good luck and godsspeed!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You must needs relax. I sense far too much jitter in your jig.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Why the furrowed brow? There are but four moves to commit to memory.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
The first step to success is concentration. The first step to concentration is concentrating!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You exhibit a rare talent...and I'm not simply saying that because I have been paid to do so by my generous employers, Manderville & Manderville.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Do you know what separates a good dancer from a great one? Grace. Without grace, we are but opo-opos tossing feces from a tree.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I could <var 1A 02 /var>tell<var 1A 01 /var> you how to dance just about as well as I could <var 1A 02 /var>tell<var 1A 01 /var> you how to love. No, you must experience it with your eyes, with your heart.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
The steps─they are anything but random. The choreographist spent moons perfecting their order so that they might tell her story.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You may be skilled in the art of dance, but I sense you still lack the passion to become a true star.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Close your eyes and feel the beat pulse through your very soul...... Hm? You can't very well memorize the routine with your eyes closed? A valid point, I suppose.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You put your right foot in... You put your right foot ou─ Hey! Can't you see I'm trying to concentrate!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
So, you think you can dance? Try this!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Discouraged? I understand. But don't let anyone tell you dancing is only about getting the motions right......it's about getting them PERFECT! One! Two! Three! Four!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
The entry fee for this race is <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> MGP. You currently possess <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var>. Proceed?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Rescue the chocobo chick?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Rescue the chocobo chick?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
The Manderville Lounge offers a variety of specialty drinks, including wine, water, watered wine, and a Gold Saucer original─wined water.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Sometimes I think the owner stationed me here just so I'd be forced to ever gaze upon the battle of the bulge being waged beneath that shimmering statue's smallclothes.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

To the untrained eye, it might appear I am merely hiding here in a frivolous attempt to avoid the many duties that I, a Gold Saucer attendant, have been assigned. So, before you go getting it in your head that I am somehow doing a disservice to this fine establishment, I ask that you promptly move along and only return when that eye of yours has received the proper training.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Assist the adventurer?<tab>Yes<tab>No<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Can you believe this? An imp of questionable character and malleable appearance has snuck into the Saucer, and it's around here somewhere pretending to be <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Would you mind tracking down the brazen trickster and throwing this brightash in its face? The glamour should wear off immediately...assuming you have the right person.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Er...could ye help? An imp is <var 1A 02 /var>impersonating<var 1A 01 /var> me. And not just me personality, mind─it's copied everything, from head to arse to...well, ye get the picture.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Now, I'll not have me private...er, appearance made a mockery of by some voidsent! If yer willing, find the bastard, and pelt him with a bit of brightash. That'll make him show his true size!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

If I could have but a moment of your time. I was tasked with finding an imp traipsing about the premises, but the bloody bastard disguised itself as <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> and ran off into a crowd.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

This brightash should suffice to dispel the fiend's glamour, but I fear this task is too much for one man alone. So what do you say? If you would aid me in this task, I must warn you: our prey looks <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> as I do. The utmost care must be taken when examining our fellow patrons about the Saucer.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Quick! Have you seen me? Not <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> me, the <var 1A 02 /var>other<var 1A 01 /var> me─the <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> pretending to be me, you see? An imp! We have to find him─me─before I do─he does─something terrible like...like purchase my Mini Cactpot ticket!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

If, by chance, you were to spot me─him─wandering about the Saucer, use this brightash I just so happened to be carrying in my─no, his─no, my─pocket. Don't ask me, or him, how it got there, or how it works, simply do it!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Begging your pardon, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but I am in dire need of assistance. An imp that is <var 1A 02 /var>exceedingly<var 1A 01 /var> skilled with glamours has taken my form and set about engaging in conduct most unbecoming. This cannot stand.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Fortunately, this brightash will allow us to set things to right. If you cast it in the face of my impostor, the truth shall be revealed to all!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Have you heard!? They say an imp has slipped into the Gold Saucer, and is impersonating its patrons. I thought it naught but a wild tale until I glimpsed a lady who shared my appearance─right down to the last detail!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The staff kindly supplied me with some special ash that will supposedly dispel the disguise, but those little demons make my skin crawl... Do you think you could find it in my stead? Remember: the creature will look <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> like me!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Beggin' your pardon, love, but have you seen a maid what looks the same as me? There's a thievin' imp about, an' its stolen me looks!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Could you help me find it? Just takes a bit o' this brightash to make it show its leathery hide!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
E-Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? I know what little sense this makes, but...I need help finding myself.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

No, I speak not of life choices. Some despicable imp has taken my form, and is causing mischief about the Gold Saucer! You should be able to expose it with this brightash, but please do be careful who you use it on. I fear there's not enough for a second attempt.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

They say you can't spell impostor without i-m-p. I wouldn't know, though, since I can't read. What does i-m-p spell again? Imp!? How did you know it was an imp who magicked itself to look just like me and create havoc all through the Saucer?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

No matter. If you know, then perhaps you can help. Take this brightash and toss it in the eyes of the <var 1A 02 /var>second<var 1A 01 /var> most beautiful woman here─that woman being the fraud who stole my face!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

This might sound strange, but, have you met me before? Not “me,” that is, but a fellow who looks just like me? And when I say “fellow,” I mean an imp pretending to be me. If not, would you help me look?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
If you think you've found him, you can use this brightash to force him to reveal his true form. So you'll help, won't you? Please tell me you will...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Argh, where is that damnable creature! Hm? Oh, some imp has decided it would be fun to transform into a Hyur and ruin the man's reputation. Aye, that man would be me.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I don't know how it got in here, but I've a surprise that should smoke it out. Here, have a look about and use this brightash on the impostor. Be careful, though: I've seen a few lads around the place who, um, share my taste in apparel.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Curse that foul voidsent! <sigh> Pardon me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I was chasing an imp a moment ago, when it transformed into me, and vanished amongst the masses.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I fear I have lost my quarry. And such a pity. Why, all it would take is a keen pair of eyes, and a pinch of brightash to reveal the fiend's true form. Would you aid me with this, friend?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Where'd that damned imp get off to— Oh, hello friend. Care to lend a hand? I nearly had the little monster, but before I realized it, I was mesmerized by the twinkle of eyes, and come<var 1F /var>hither lips. Needless to say, he got away from me.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

He's the spitting image of me, but this brightash should be enough to dispel his glamour. Time is of the essence, <var 08 E905 ((my dear lady)) ((my good sir)) /var>. The realm is full to bursting with my good looks alone. I daresay two of me is simply too much.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Twelve damn that scurvy imp all the way down to the seventh hell! I had the bloody bugger in me grasp when he up an' stole me skin like they was the drawers off a dimpled doxy!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The lot here at the Saucer gave me summat to cast off the glamour, but every time I get near the thing, he steals away to some other corner of this ruddy labyrinth. Ah, but you, now, he might not see comin'. Help a man out, would ye?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Hey, listen! You'd best be careful. There's an imp using glamours to impersonate patrons. I should know─I just saw <var 1A 02 /var>myself<var 1A 01 /var> in a crowd not five minutes ago!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Gods only know what he'll do if we don't stop him. But I've just the thing: a satchel of brightash. Want to help me find him?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? Have you seen me before? I mean, have you seen someone who looks <var 1A 02 /var>just like me<var 1A 01 /var>? There's an imp in here somewhere, and it's wearing <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> face and <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> garb!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Pray take this brightash and fling it at that...that...fashion thief! I should warn you, however, that there may be a number of innocents around that are merely attempting─and failing─to imitate my signature style.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Where is it? Where is that <var 1A 02 /var>awful<var 1A 01 /var> little imp!? I'll tear it to shreds for masquerading as me!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Normally, I wouldn't hurt a fly. But what if I am blamed for its mischief? I couldn't bear the blemish on my good name! Please, use this brightash to reveal the impostor─before it makes a criminal of me!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Did you see it? Did you see it? I was chasing that mean old imp, and I nearly had him, I really did. He ran me in circles all about the Gold Saucer, then, just as I reached out to grab him, he disguised himself as me and dove into a crowd.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Could you help me find him, pretty please? If you use this brightash, he should change back, and then catching him will be easy! The imp looks just like me, so take a <var 1A 02 /var>good<var 1A 01 /var> look before you go, tee hee.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

No! I did not cast Blizzard on the privy seats, and I did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> put a clutch of ninki nanka eggs in the complimentary wine tun! It was that accursed imp! He's using some glamour that makes him look exactly like me!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I purchased a sack of brightash with my last MGP in hopes of dispelling the imp's glamour, but as of yet, I've had little luck in locating the cur, and now I'm down to my last pinch. It may be I'm merely drunk on the Saucer's bright lights, but something tells me I should risk everything with you.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I've looked <var 1A 02 /var>everywhere<var 1A 01 /var> for that imp, but he's always a step ahead! You know of who I speak, do you not? The rapscallion cavorting about the Saucer in my image, that's who!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Be a dear and lend me a hand, won't you? I've barely the strength to stand, much less search. Find me─the <var 1A 02 /var>other<var 1A 01 /var> me─and throw this brightash in her face. That should put an end to his games.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

An imp is loose in the Gold Saucer! I had the creature cornered, but then it shifted shape into an Elezen lady of surpassing beauty. Why, it was like peering into a mirror!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I simply couldn't bring myself to hurl enchanted ash at my own perfect features...so you'll have to do it. There need only be one “fairest of them all.”<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Pray, friend, lend me your ears. I am come in pursuit of an imp, one who has perfectly assumed my visage down to the last ilm.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I would have you seek this fiend, and dispel its foul glamour by casting brightash upon it!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You haven't seen me anywhere else around here, have you? Some blasted imp has taken on my form, and the Twelve only know what trouble he's causing. Could you help me track him down?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

This brightash should suffice to dispel the fiend's glamour, but only use it on one who looks <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> as I do. <sigh> I'll be glad when this nonsense is over and done with.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I have not the time nor patience to mince words with a common adventurer...that is, unless you can assist me in hunting down a wily imp who has stolen my identity and is using it to corrupt my lines of credit here at the Saucer.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Find this flawless replica and cast off its veil of deceit by tossing a fistful of brightash at its feet. The Saucer guards will take care of the rest.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Damn that imp, he's stolen my soul! And now I hear he's paradin' around the Gold Saucer doin' whatever he pleases!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
He'll get what's comin', though, I've seen to that! I got my hands on brightash─you'll find him for me and rub it in his face! What do ye say!?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I was chasin' down some vermin o' the void what's been terrorizin' the place, when the little bugger suddenly grew into a big, bleedin' Roegadyn.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Damn thing got away while I was stunned from the sight o' me own ugly mug leerin' back at me. Ye'd best take this brightash an' deal with the imp yerself. I don't need a reminder of 'ow unpretty I am...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Ye heard there's a shape-shiftin' imp millin' about? Can't say I thought twice about it, what as the place's teemin' with blokes who look like me. Till I ran into the spittin' image o' meself, that is. Hells, I were too shocked to catch the bugger!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Now, I got brightash to make the voidsent show its true colors. I need a mate to hurl it─after findin' the bastard in this sea o' folk. So what say ye? Will ye do the throwin' fer me?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Have you seen an imp running around by chance? I suppose not, on account of the bugger being dressed as me. I'd appreciate it if you could help me find him. I've been searching all day, but I've had no luck picking myself out of the crowd.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

He won't be able to hide after you use this brightash, but be careful who you use it on. Can't imagine anyone would take kindly to a pinch of that in the face.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You ever seen an imp? I saw me an imp once. His eyes were big and round like a Sea Wolf's. His lips, grey and pursed like a Sea Wolf's. His muscled shoulders broad...like a Sea Wolf's. In other words, he was the bloody spittin' image of yours truly.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Now, ye cannot expect a man to sleep sound knowin' his double is out makin' all manner of menace an' mayhem. Which is why I'm puttin' out the call to every lord and lady I come across. Use this here brightash to strip the imp o' me skin so's that I might rest easy once again.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You there, 'venturer! You haven't seen another Hellsguard what looks exactly like me, have you? A godsdamned imp has taken to masquerading as people, and I'm his latest victim!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The little bastard's disguise is perfect down to every detail─but <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> will be his undoing. When you find him, you can use this brightash to dispel the glamour. Be careful, though─I only have enough for one throw!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You there! I require aid! An imp has assumed my form and is likely racking up a sizable debt against my name as we speak.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I have strained the limits of my purse enough already! Quickly, take this brightash and reveal the devil ere it bring upon me financial doom!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

To put it simply: if you increase your chocobo's rating, then they will become eligible to participate in higher classes. However, if you wish to know more...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Victory does not always go to the swift, oh no! Oftentimes, it goes to the jockey who makes judicious use of the items <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> acquires during the race.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Seeking to arm yourself with a little knowledge? Good for you! “Knowing is half the battle,” as they say.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Like race items, race abilities can provide tremendous advantages if skillfully applied.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Sanctioned chocobo races are held outdoors, and thus subject to the whims of nature. However, certain chocobos can turn this to their advantage.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
For a nominal fee, you too can experience the thrill of competition─and mayhap the joy of triumph!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Moreover, only a single race chocobo may be registered to a jockey at a time.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Therefore, if you wish to ride a different chocobo in the races, you will need to retire your current one before you can register the new one.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

If you wish to enter a race, I will provide you with a selection of races appropriate to your rating. Once you have specified a class and a course, all that remains is to pay the fee and wait.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

As your chocobo gains experience, it will grow stronger, and its rank will increase. This will, in turn, increase your chocobo's rating, which is a more comprehensive measurement of your chocobo's ability.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

A higher rating will earn you entrance to more prestigious races in higher classes. However, the reverse is true as well─highly rated chocobos are barred from lower classes.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

To view your race chocobo's rating, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, then select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Chocobo<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the interface.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
If you are considering such a change, the feathertrader at Moogle's Gift Mounts can show you a selection of fledglings.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
These race items are scattered throughout each course. Keep your eyes open and claim them when you can!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Race items will be added to your hotbar automatically, and can be used to help yourself or hinder your opponents.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Choco Potion<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Instantly restores stamina by 10%.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Stamina Tablet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Prevents stamina reduction for 10 seconds. If stamina is zero, a small amount is restored.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sprint Shoes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Summons a quick burst of speed.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Choco Aether<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Allows a previously used race ability to be executed again.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Graviball<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Afflicts the forerunning chocobo with Heavy.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bacchus's Water<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Sends the forerunning chocobo into a Frenzied state.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Briar Caltrop<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Surrounds your chocobo with a ring of thorns which will sap the stamina of any chocobos that enter.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Hero Tonic<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Invigorates your chocobo for 15 seconds, increasing its overall performance while nullifying any enfeeblements.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Choco Meteor<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Summons a meteor from the heavens to wreak havoc on all other chocobos.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Of course, with experience comes familiarity. I suspect you will have no difficulty recalling each item's characteristics in due time.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Many of these abilities bestow passive benefits for the duration of a race, while others can only be used for a limited time.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Those which afford limited benefits may only be utilized once per race, so take care not to waste them!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
While there are chocobos who prefer clear, cloudless skies, other chocobos thrive in stormy weather.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Alas, when chocobos compete in conditions which run contrary to their preferences, it is all but assured that their performance will suffer...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Excellent! Now that you have an understanding of the fundamentals, you can begin competing in sanctioned races!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Ugh...too many people by half. Got to nab that imp, though─it's wearing my form. <sigh> Brightash is all it'd take to make the wretch show its true wings.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Would you do it for me? Just get a proper eyeful of me─elsewise, you'll get an earful from some angry fellow.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Care to help me track down an imp? It's disguised itself to blend in with the crowd. Heaping insult to injury, it chose <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> for its costume.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Please say you'll help me? This brightash should be all you need to expose him for what he is, but it needs be done sooner rather than later.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Good <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>, might I bother you with a humble request? You see, I am a self-professed scholar of the void, come to this most unlikely of places in search of a creature from beyond this plane. A long story short, I found my specimen, but not before he had stolen my very face and escaped into the clamor. Now I seek a kind soul to uncover the imp so that he may be captured and carried back to my laboratorium.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The glamour magicks he employs are far more powerful than aught I have heretofore seen. Not only has the voidsent successfully mimicked my physical appearance, but even the clothes he wears are exact replications of those you see before you. One will need a keen eye─and this rare brightash─if they are to see through the imp's tightly woven veil of trickery.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<cough> Gods, why!? Is...is this what you people do here?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Ack! <cough> <cough> Just wait until the manager hears about this!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Ah, brightash! I am quite familiar with the foul stuff. The residue of a spent will-o'-the-wisp or -wykes, mainly used to dispel the glamours of an im─ Oh, you didn't think I was an─ Why, that is simply preposterous!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You...hit the wrong person, then. Wonderful. I look forward to being accused of all manner of terrible mischief...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Got away, did it? Ah well, I suppose it weren't so easy to catch.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Oh dear. So he gave you the slip as well? Mayhaps a closer inspection of my attire would have proved useful in your search. Well, no matter. I'll catch that pest eventually.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

So you're telling me the <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> you found wasn't <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, or <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var> after all? <sigh> I suppose if I want something done right, I have to do it myself...even if that something is finding <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var>self.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
That imp yet traipses about besmirching my good name!? Ye gods, the very thought fair brings me to tears!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You didn't nab the imp? Hells! You'd think it easy to spot a maid as comely as me.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Let me guess─you frivoled away my brightash on the <var 1A 02 /var>third<var 1A 01 /var>, or perhaps <var 1A 02 /var>fourth<var 1A 01 /var> most beautiful woman in all the Saucer? Ah, well. Failure is but a four letter word. Or was it five?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You couldn't find him, could you? <sigh> I knew I should've looked myself. I appreciate that you tried, though.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You wasted the brightash!? Ugh, I <var 1A 02 /var>told<var 1A 01 /var> you to be careful! Well, I suppose I'm not as unique as Mother always said I was...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
<sigh> Well, you did your best, and have my thanks. However, the search must go on...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

He got away from you? Heavens forfend! Think of the countless men and women swooning at the sight of my stolen face. Who will be left to enjoy the Gold Saucer? <tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Couldn't find the swivin' sneak, could ye? Well, I'm not one to fault a <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((man)) /var> for tryin'.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Oh dear, you didn't really throw that brightash into an innocent bystander's face, did you? Well, if anyone asks, you didn't get it from me.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Chose wrongly, did you? Don't blame yourself, dear─I have many imitators, and <var 1A 02 /var>most<var 1A 01 /var> of them aren't terrible creatures from the void.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You...you have failed me!? D-Dear me, then I must acquire more brightash to keep this fiend at bay!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Awww, he got away? He's more clever than I thought, but I'll get him! Just you wait and see!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

No. Don't say it. Don't say you weren't able to find the imp. Just walk away and leave me to believe that my already terrible day will not be growing any worse.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You couldn't find him either, could you? He's more clever than the average imp─we dare not underestimate him.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Hm? What do you mean there was yet <var 1A 02 /var>another<var 1A 01 /var> as fair as I? Are you mayhap blind to the subtleties of perfection?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Oh... Well, do not despair, my friend. My figure is not so unique, I suppose. Mayhap 'tis time I take scissors to my hair...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I see you have failed. I might have expected as much.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
What do ye mean ye buggered it up!? I ain't made of brightash!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Got the wrong bloke, did ye? Heh, knowin' there's other lads as rough-lookin' as me out there actually makes me feel a mite cheerier...<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Didn't get the bastard, eh? Bah. Must be me sense o' style─too bloody average to stand out.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Mistook someone else for the imp, eh? That crafty little bastard. His luck won't hold out forever, I promise you that!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

No luck, eh? And here, the Saucer'd have ye believin' this was the luckiest place in the realm. Though, I reckon skin stealin' imps weren't summat the Manderville man had writ up in his plans.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You couldn't find him? Damn it all! Ah, but I won't hold you responsible. You tried. It's that godsdamned imp what needs to answer for his crimes!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I'm done for, then. Of all the marks in sight, why did that imp have to choose me...?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You found that imp charlatan, then!? Wonderful! I feared I would have to answer for whatever twisted trouble the creature caused... Thank you kindly!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

My hero! I trust you taught that imp a lesson he will never forget!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

You clobbered the bugger, eh? Thank the Twelve!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Well, it seems you took the <var 1A 02 /var>imp<var 1A 01 /var> out of <var 1A 02 /var>imp<var 1A 01 /var>oster! My thanks, adventurer!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You...you actually found him!? Praise the Twelve, I'm saved!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Fine work! I could tell you had a keen eye for detail!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You have my deepest gratitude, my friend! To find my double within this throng, your eyes must be sharper than a blade.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Well done! The good patrons of the Gold Saucer are free to bask in my beauty once more. But do not stare too long, lest you enjoy <var 1A 02 /var>too much<var 1A 01 /var> of a good thing.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I'll be a gelded Garlean! Ye done denuded the dastard! Gods willin', he'll think twice afore crossin' the likes of me...er, us again!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You caught him? Twelve be praised, I wasn't sure you could do it! Let's hope this is the end of his mischief.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Impressive. I'm surprised you were able to pick out that imp from among my hordes of adoring imitators!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Huzzah! I hope you gave that imp a piece of your mind, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>─and a good thrashing as well!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Yay! You did it! Hopefully that mean old imp won't bother anyone else.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I don't know how to thank you, kind adventurer. Now all that remains is to clear my name of the myriad unwell that ne'er-do-well perpetrated while wearing my features like a gown.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Masterfully done, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! To see through such powerful glamours, you must have incredible powers of observation!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Nicely done! Beauty such as mine should be as a rare and elusive flower─not a common garden weed.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
My friend, you may consider me impressed. I hope I, too, may one day capture imps by my own hand.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Nicely done, friend. I would surely be at my wit's end if you hadn't come along. May the Spinner smile upon you.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
It seems I was wrong to doubt you. Hm? Of course I doubted you. I doubt everyone.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Gwahahaha! Wish I had been there to see the little bastard squirm!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Got the bugger, did ye? A good thing too─the world don't need more'n one o' me uglyin' up the place.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Ye did it! Har har, always knew I'm the kind of bloke what sticks out like a tuna among sardines!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
He's gone? Thank the Twelve! The Gold Saucer is a better place for having you here.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Might be I can finally get me some rest now that the fiend has fled. Ye have me thanks and then some!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Gods bless you, 'venturer, you did it! My good name is preserved!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You've revealed the imp!? I thank you! My ailing purse thanks you!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Thank you! My friend, you've inspired me─no more will I fear the crowds.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
I was right to call upon you for help. Who says you can't depend on the kindness of strangers?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Interesting. You say the creature was well-spoken when under the influence of the glamour, but then reverted to its broken imp-speak when the spell was broken? The magicks are truly far more remarkable than I believed if their influence stretches beyond mere appearance and into the realm of complex speech and individual mannerisms. Thank you for this, adventurer.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
At last, the time has come for you and your race chocobo to take to the track─for training, that is!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

As you will observe, races are divided into different classes. Which classes you can enter are determined by your chocobo's current rating─which is <var 20 E802 /var>, in case you were unaware.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Maiden<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> class is open only to the most inexperienced competitors. As such, you and your chocobo will quickly outgrow it.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

As your chocobo's rating increases, you will find yourself competing against far more experienced jockeys in races with even stricter rules and regulations.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

That said, the rewards you can receive more than make up for the increase in difficulty. Train your chocobo well, and may the Spinner's pull be ever in your favor.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
You can register for chocobo races at any time by speaking with the race chocobo registrar or via the Duty Finder.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
We hold races in a variety of locales, from the forests of Gridania to the shores of Vylbrand, not to mention Thanalan's own Sagolii Desert.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
These courses are of varied lengths, and each includes features unique to each region.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

To compete at the highest levels, you must know every yalm of every course by heart. But that is a thought for another day; today, you need only enjoy yourself!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Am...am I to understand that before even undertaking the training course, you chose to... No, no, of course not. No one would do such a thing. It makes no sense. I can only presume you have yet to register your fledgling chocobo...or have somehow misplaced the registration form. ...Of course, if you <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> so foolish as to part ways with your fledgling, then you would need to obtain a new one by speaking with the feathertrader at Moogle's Gift Mounts in Bentbranch Meadows.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Away with you. Can you not see I'm <var 1A 02 /var>dancing<var 1A 01 /var>?<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

I came all the way from the far eastern reaches of Othard to dance in the second-most prestigious casino in all southern Eorzea. That is what I tell myself each morning.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Here at the Manderville Gold Saucer, Lord of Verminion tournaments are held with clockwork regularity!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
Entering a tournament allows you to play matches against your fellow adventurers in a battle to become the top-ranked player.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Once you've signed up, you'll want to select the “Tournament” option at one of the play tables. Claiming victory in a tournament match will contribute points to your final tournament score.<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>

Only a set number of tournament matches can be played per tournament─seeking out and defeating opponents ranked higher on the board will award you more points, so pick your battles carefully!<tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab><tab>
